metadata.description: Reusable skills and plugins for Claude — task delegation, research workflows, and multi-step agent frameworks.

plugins.name: agent-brief
plugins.description: Task delegation and project scoping framework. Teaches Claude to clarify goals, break work into checkpoints, and stop at decision points for approval.

plugins.name: reddit-research
plugins.description: Research Reddit threads, subreddits, and discussions using Reddit's public JSON API. Fetches posts, full comment trees, and nested comments — no API key required.
